dialogue: Spirit pilots the platoon's ship to Prohibre and ferries
all the troops to the Empire's hidden base.
Tequia orders the captains to organize their squads and
within the hour the whole platoon is ready
to march on the Army encampment.
Meanwhile, Tequia, Spirit, and a few others stay at the base.
We'll stay here and act as a command center. If any squad
reports information or requests backup, you'll handle it here.
Understood!
Now, the two of us will be waiting around for a bit.
While I doubt it will happen, stay prepared in case
we need to make a rapid escape offplanet.
Yes, Ms. Tequia. Can I ask some questions while we wait?
Depends, what kind of questions?
...What's the Empire's goal with all these attacks?
To what ends are you destroying so many lives?
I suppose that's a fair question. It makes sense that
you'd want to know about your employer, after all.
The best answer I can give is that it's the will of the Empress.
Her word is law, and her word was to expand the Empire's influence.
As for why she wanted to do so...well, who can say?
Before trusted general or confidant, I am her subordinate.
It's not my place to question her in personal matters.
I see...
Don't worry, with time I'm sure you'll understand.
Excuse me, Ms. Tequia! There's a situation we need your help with!
Alright, tell me the details immediately!
The platoon steadily finished its attack, until finally overwhelming
the enemy. After achieving victory, they returned to Regnum.
